pages.text: $(li)Pandas are rare neutral animals that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/bamboo_jungle)Bamboo Jungles$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)These creatures will attack you only if you hurt them first, but only once.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bamboo)Bamboo$(/l) upon death.
Pandas will follow you while you are carrying $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bamboo)Bamboo$(/l) in your hand.
